english.segment1: This man came to me he was looking for action. Pulling a blade to my neck. He said, Call me the butcher cause that's my trade. And you know that Ive come to collect.
english.segment2: I said. Hit me now. and well see where it leads
english.segment3: Cut me out. if you think I will bleed
english.segment4: strike me down. If you think youre a man
english.segment5: Cause I know that you don't understand..
english.segment6: Because there is no weapon. There is no blade
english.segment7: You wonder why Im not afraid?. Ive erased all of my fear of the grave. Youll never kill him that lives inside of me
english.segment8: He looked into my eyes, all he saw was conviction. Dropping the blade to the earth. I said, How could you think that Id ever retreat?. You know that Im already dead.
